products.name: Scindapsis Pictus
products.description: A pothos family trailing vine that grows well in low to medium light.

products.name: Monstera Deliciosa
products.description: The popular monstera is a fast grower that likes indirect light.

products.name: ZZ
products.description: The ZZ is a great plant if you have low light conditions.

products.name: Sansevieria
products.description: Sansevieria also known as a snake plant does well in low light conditions.

products.name: Alocasia
products.description: Fast grower when given bright indirect light and high humidity.

products.name: Philodendron Birkin
products.description: Part of the philodendron family the birkin grows in bright indirect light.

products.name: Rhaphidophora Tetrasperma
products.description: Also known as the mini monstera is a trailing plant that does well in medium to bright light.

products.name: Moonshine Sansevieria
products.description: Part of the Sanseviera family the moonshine has light green leaves, does well in low light.

products.name: Monstera Adansonii
products.description: A trailing vine that develops holes within the leave to make sure the bottom leaves recieve enough light.

products.name: Monstera Cutting
products.description: A big leaf cutting from the Monstera Deliciosa plant.

products.name: Air Plant
products.description: An air plant that needs no soil to grow just water every 2 weeks from the bottom.

products.name: Pilea Peperomiodes
products.description: A plant that grows many babies that are easy to propagate, does well in medium light.

products.name: Varigated Burle Marx Cutting
products.description: Climbing burle marx with high varigation from mother plant, multiple nodes to propogate.

products.name: Philodendron Squamiferum
products.description: Part of the philodendron family known as the hairy philodendron likes indirect bright light with high humidity.

products.name: Monstera Albo
products.description: A monstera deliciosa that has varigation that comes through even more with good indirect bright light.

products.name: White Princess
products.description: A philodrendron with white varigation that produces more with bright indirect lighting.

products.name: Philodendron Verrucosum
products.description: From the philodendron family this plant loves humidity and bright indirect light.

products.name: Philodendron Red Cherry
products.description: Known as the red cherry for its leaves that push out red then eventually turn green.

products.name: Monstera Albo cutting
products.description: A cutting with two big leaves and active nodes that are easy to propagate comes from a half moon.

products.name: Pink Princess
products.description: A philodrendron that produces pink variagation on leaves. High humidity and bright indirect light.

products.name: Thai Constellation
products.description: A varigated thai constellation cutting extrememly rare, multiple growth points and nodes.

products.name: Syngonium Albo Cutting
products.description: From the syngonium family this cutting comes from a highly varigated mom. Three leaves with multiple nodes.

products.name: Pink Princess
products.description: A smaller pink princess with two new growth points and good root system.

products.name: Syngonium Mojito
products.description: From the syngonium family this cutting comes from a highly varigated mom. Four leaves with multiple nodes.
